entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late in the evening with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023
